notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: DB developed and planned this trial under the supervision of JD, MT, MS, and SR, who is the principal investigator. DB, RES, JH-R, AP, JK, and LK perform patient treatment and clinical assessments. TW and CPH are the supervising diagnostic radiologists. DS is responsible for treatment planning, dosimetry, and plan verification. JK and MK are the trial statisticians and responsible for statistical planning and statistical analysis. CK is responsible for data management. JM-W is responsible for neurocognitive testing. AH coordinates the study. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
